程序包 ca.utoronto.utm.paint

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    MouseStrategy
    an mouse event strategy interface that can be implemented by diffrent mouse events
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Circle
    Subclass of Shape, which creates a circle centered at first click, with radius of distance from first click to the last Point clicked.
    ColorChooserPanel
    Creates a GUI view and controller for selecting color.
    Diamond
    A subclass from Shape, which creates a diamond (tetragon) object, which is able to be drawn from different directions and the size of the shape is also customized by the user.
    doNothing
    a mouse event handler when nothing happens.
    Eraser
    subclass of Squiggle class, which creates an Eraser object, which can draw squiggles in the color of the Canvas, acts like an Eraser.
    FillStyleChooserPanel
    This class creates a GUI view for the style selector which allows the user to choose the shape to be outlined or filled or both, and the thickness of the outline.
    Line
    Subclass from Shape, which allows the user to draw straight lines by click and drag on the canvas.
    mouseClicked
    a Mouse event handler when the mouse is clicked
    mouseDragged
    a Mouse event handler when the mouse is dragged, which allows the user to see instant feedback of the shape they draw.
    mouseEntered
    a Mouse event handler when the mouse is entered
    mouseExited
    a Mouse event handler when the mouse is exited
    mouseMoved
    a Mouse event handler when the mouse is moved
    mousePressed
    a Mouse event handler when the mouse is pressed
    mouseReleased
    a Mouse event handler when the mouse is released
    Paint  
    PaintModel  
    Point
    A point class to record the xy coordinates of all the shapes.
    Polyline
    a subclass from Shape, creates a polyline object which allows user to click on the canvas and the polyline will be automatically formed.
    Rectangle
    Subclass of Shape, which creates a rectangle object with two opposite corners at first click and the last.
    Shape
    Base class of all the shape object, which contains the basic attribute and methods that every shape has.
    ShapeBuilder
    a shape Factory, which given an string of the desired object, and the factory returns the object with given attribute.
    ShapeChooserPanel
    This class creates a GUI view of collection of shapes for the user to choose from.
    ShapeStack
    Creates a shapeStack model for PaintModel.
    Square
    Subclass of Shape, which creates a square object with two opposite corners at first click and the last.
    Squiggle
    Subclass from Shape, which creates a group of points where the mouse is dragged and are connected by short lines.
    StrategyFactory
    A factory of mouse events, when certain mouseEvents is detected, a strategy of the mouse event handler will be created.
    View
